DOC.detailed_description: The Investigators design one-arm phase II prospective sequential clinical trial ass therapeutic efficacy 177-Lu- [ DOTA 0 , Tyr 3 ] octreotate ( 177-Lu- DOTATATE ) apply intravenously three separate dos patient inoperable progressive WDNET .
DOC.criteria: Patients inoperable gastroenteropancreatic neuroendocrine tumor . Histopathologic diagnosis confirm Instituto Nacional de Cancerología . Somatostatin receptorpositive tumor least one site abnormal focal uptake > liver physiologic uptake ( 3+ ) observe 99mTcHYNICTOC scintigraphy practice less 6 month treatment 177Lu DOTATATE . Karnofsky functional score > 60 . Life expectancy > 3 month . Multiple inoperable metastatic site . Patient voluntarily willing participate trial . Hemoglobin ( Hb ) > 8.8 g/dl Leucocytes ( Leu ) > 2 x 103/µl Platelets ( Plaq ) > 80 x 103/µl Total Bilirrubin ( BT ) ≤ 3 time upper limit normal range . Serum albumin > 3 g/dl normal prothrombin time . At least one measurable CT tumor lesion . Nonlactating woman negative pregnancy blood test . Creatinine clearance > 40 ml/min serum creatinine < 1.5 mg/dl and/or isotopic glomerular filtration rate > 50 ml/min . Test result predate treatment least : blood test result ≤ 4 week , liver blood test < 1 month , renal function test < 1 week , CT ≤ 4 month 99mTcHYNICTOC scintigraphy < 6 month . Patients previously treat radionuclide therapy . Patients treat chemo radiotherapy within past 6 month . Patients unable comply clinical followup Nuclear Medicine Endocrinology unit . Patients unwilling participate trial provide write informed consent .
